trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Wheat Ridge
There were no other sightings in Wheat Ridge on or around January 3rd 2011
Summary: it was a cylinder with multi colored lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my laundry room putting clothes in the drier. than i was looking out the window over my washer and saw this orange light just sitting there in the distance. so i was like what the hell is that. so i walked out my back door and it was just hovering there and than it moved behind the trees and than came back again.after that I just watch the ufo go from being in the trees to lifting straight up and moved to the right and that's when i saw all the lights they were multi colored and than I saw a star like one that started moving too. than it shot all the way over my house and went right over my neighborhouse
